member.name: M:ACGIntegrationEditor.AmbientCGWindow.Update(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the entries by either using a cached response (saved in ) or fetching a new one from ambientCG.
member.param: Where to force update by fetching new data from the API.

member.name: P:ACGIntegrationEditor.Api.Download.Attribute
member.summary: The asset type. Includes the name of the resolution and filetype(PNG or JPEG).

member.name: P:ACGIntegrationEditor.Api.Download.DownloadLink
member.summary: The download link recommended by the api docs. It is use to track downloads.

member.name: P:ACGIntegrationEditor.Api.Download.FullDownloadPath
member.summary: The full download path bypassing any tracking. It is provided in case the client cannot handle redirects.

member.name: P:ACGIntegrationEditor.Api.Download.FileType
member.summary: Filetype of the download, usually zip.

member.name: P:ACGIntegrationEditor.Api.Download.ZipContent
member.summary: The names of the files contained inside the zip.
